about.subtitle: About NMS Academy
about.title: We are here to help you achieve your learning goals
about.description: NMS Academy is your first destination for smart learning, where we combine quality content and accessibility to provide you with a unique learning experience.
about.mission_desc: Empowering learners in the Arab world by providing high-quality educational content at competitive prices.
about.vision_desc: To be the leading global educational platform in providing modern digital and technical skills.
about.community_desc: An interactive learning environment that allows you to connect with experts and other students.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Everything you need to know about the platform and subscriptions
faqs.a1: You can start by creating a free account, then browse the available courses and choose what suits you.
faqs.a2: Yes, all certificates issued by the platform are certified and documented with a special serial number.
faqs.a3: Yes, yearly and pro plan subscribers can download lessons via the mobile app.
faqs.q4: How can I contact the instructor?
faqs.a4: You can communicate with instructors through the discussion section of each course or during live classes.
faqs.a5: Yes, we provide a money-back guarantee within the first 7 days of subscription if you are not satisfied.
